alert.note: Alert for Cobb; Paulding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 10:40PM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Sweetwater Creek at Brownsville at Powder Springs affecting Cobb and Paulding Counties. Sweetwater Creek near Austell affecting Cobb and Douglas Counties. For the Sweetwater Creek...including Powder Springs, Powder Springs, Austell, Powder Springs, Austell, Austell, Sweetwater Creek below Austell...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Sweetwater Creek at Brownsville at Powder Springs. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 13 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding will occur in the woodlands...fields and pastures of the natural flood plain upstream and downstream from the gage at Brownsville Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 13.1 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 13 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 1045 AM EST.
